entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 early this morning then southwest 30 near noon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
